00040 #ifndef RAY_H
00041 #define RAY_H
00042 
00043 #include "tgc.h"
00044 #include "Point3D.h"
00045 #include "Vector3D.h"
00046 
00047 class Ray
00048 {
00049 public:
00050     Ray() : mint( tgc::Epsilon ), maxt( tgc::Infinity )
00051     {
00052     }
00053 
00054     Ray( const Point3D& orig, const Vector3D& direc, double start = tgc::Epsilon, double end = tgc::Infinity )
00055     : origin( orig ), mint( start ), maxt( end )
00056     {
00057         setDirection( direc );
00058     }
00059 
00060     ~Ray( )
00061     {
00062     }
00063 
00064     Point3D operator()( double t ) const
00065     {
00066        return origin + m_direction * t;
00067     }
00068 
00069     const Vector3D& direction() const
00070     {
00071         return m_direction;
00072     }
00073 
00074     const Vector3D& invDirection() const
00075     {
00076         return m_invDirection;
00077     }
00078 
00079     void setDirection( const Vector3D& direction )
00080     {
00081         m_direction = direction;
00082         m_invDirection.x = 1.0/m_direction.x;
00083         m_invDirection.y = 1.0/m_direction.y;
00084         m_invDirection.z = 1.0/m_direction.z;
00085     }
00086 
00087     bool operator==( const Ray& ray ) const
00088     {
00089         if( this == &ray ) return true;
00090         return ( ( origin == ray.origin ) && ( m_direction == ray.m_direction ) &&
00091                      !( fabs( mint - ray.mint) > tgc::Epsilon ) && !( fabs( maxt - ray.maxt) > tgc::Epsilon ) );
00092     }
00093 
00094     Point3D origin;
00095     mutable double mint;
00096     mutable double maxt;
00097 
00098 private:
00099     Vector3D m_direction;
00100     Vector3D m_invDirection;
00101 };
00102 
00103 
00104 #endif
